property.description: If selected code for parameter checking is included in the build.
If enabled, code for NMI support in register start mode is included in the build.

constraint.display: Unique name required for each instance
Driver used multiple times. Can only be used once.
Name must be a valid C symbol

property.description: Select the watchdog timeout in cycles.
Select the allowed watchdog refresh start point in %.
Select the allowed watchdog refresh end point in %.
Select what happens when the watchdog timer expires.
Select the watchdog state in low power mode.

option.display: WDT Count Enabled in Low Power Mode
WDT Count Disabled in Low Power Mode

property.description: A user callback function must be provided if the WDT is configured to generate an NMI when the timer underflows or a refresh error occurs. If this callback function is provided, it will be called from the NMI handler each time the watchdog triggers.

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol
